dublinCore.dc:title: 109 HR 9617 IH: To amend the Delaware Water Gap National Recreation Area Improvement Act to extend the exception to the closure of certain roads within the Recreation Area for local businesses, and for other purposes.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Cartwright introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To amend the Delaware Water Gap National Recreation Area Improvement Act to extend the exception to the closure of certain roads within the Recreation Area for local businesses, and for other purposes.

section.header: Use of certain roads within the Delaware Water Gap National Recreation Area
section.text: Section 4(b) of the Delaware Water Gap National Recreation Area Improvement Act (Public Law 109â€“156; 119 Stat. 2948; 131 Stat. 2246) is amended, in the matter preceding paragraph (1), by striking Until and all that follows through subsection (a) and inserting Until September 30, 2026, subsection (a).
